TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Cursor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示沿著軸定義位置的水平或垂直線。

span.span: Represents a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料指標是水平或垂直列會定義沿著軸的位置。A cursor is a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis. 選取範圍是沿座標軸定義依開始和結束的位置，並顯示使用半透明效果的色彩範圍。A range selection is a range along an axis that is defined by a beginning and end position, and is displayed using a semi-transparent color. 資料指標和範圍選取項目都由實作類別，其會公開為和屬性物件。Cursors and range selections are both implemented by the class, which is exposed as the and properties of the object. 物件可用於 X 軸的圖表區域中，而物件可用於 Y 軸。The object is for the X axis of a chart area, and the object is for the Y axis. 這些物件的屬性會決定相關聯的軸是主要或次要。The property of these objects determines whether the associated axis is primary or secondary. 只有資料指標和範圍選取一個功能之外找到類別是根目錄中的事件與資料指標和範圍選取物件。The only cursor and range selection functionality found outside the class are the events related to the cursor and range selection that are in the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoScroll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷如果範圍選取作業超出圖表區域的界限，是否會發生捲動。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether scrolling will occur if a range selection operation extends beyond a boundary of the chart area.

value.span: 如果資料檢視會自動捲動，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data view can be scrolled automatically; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若資料檢視不會顯示繪製數列中的所有資料點和使用者選取範圍，自動捲動檢視便會發生這個屬性是`true`和滑鼠，而因此的資料指標 — 圖表區域界限之外移動。If a data view does not display all data points in a plotted series and a range is being selected by the user, automatic scrolling of the view will occur if this property is `true` and the mouse—and therefore the cursor—is moved outside the chart area boundary. 捲動才會沿著軸可用來檢視詳細資料。Scrolling will only occur along an axis if there is more data available to be viewed. 如果使用者拉近到資料的子集，就會造成資料檢視，通常不會顯示所有資料。A data view that does not display all data usually results if the end-user zooms into a subset of data. 檢視和縮放由實作類別。Views and zooming are implemented by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType AxisType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定已附加資料指標的座標軸。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of axis that the cursor is attached to.

value.span: 列舉值，表示這個座標軸是附加到主要座標軸還是次要座標軸。

span.span: An enumeration value that represents whether the axis is attached to the primary or secondary axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩個集合的座標軸： 主要和次要。There are two sets of axes: primary and secondary. 主座標軸的橫條圖以外的所有圖表位於底部 （主要 x 軸） 及左 （主要 y 軸） 的圖表區域的框線。Primary axes for all charts except the bar charts are located at the bottom (primary X-axis) and left (primary Y-axis) border of the chart area. 次要軸位於的權限 （次要 x 軸） 和圖表區域的頂端 （次要 y 軸） 框線。The secondary axes are located at the right (secondary X-axis) and top (secondary Y-axis) border of the chart area. > [!NOTE] > 如果繪製在圖表區域中的所有數列都使用只有一種類型的座標軸 （例如，在主要 x 軸），然後將此屬性設定為不是由 （在此情況下，次要 x 軸） 數列軸類型沒有任何作用。資料指標會自動附加至唯一用來繪製數列的座標軸。If all series plotted within a chart area use only one type of axis (for example, the primary X-axis), then setting this property to an axis type not used by the series (in this case, the secondary X-axis) will have no effect; the cursor will automatically be attached to the only axis being used to plot the series.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 執行會釋放 (Free)、釋放 (Release) 或重設 Unmanaged 資源之應用程式定義的工作。

span.span: Performs application-defined tasks that free, release, or reset unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源， 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both unmanaged and managed resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源 (後者為選擇性釋放)。

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Interval { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料指標間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor interval.
The cursor interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定資料指標如何通常及在何處可以繪製使用者，以及何處可以繪製的開頭和結束點的選取範圍。The property determines how often and where a cursor can be drawn by an end user, as well as where the beginning and end points of a range selection can be drawn. 值為零，也就是預設值，表示資料指標或範圍的選取項目可以任何位置繪製在圖表區域中。A value of zero, which is the default value, signifies that a cursor or range selection can be drawn anywhere within a chart area. 為非零值表示的資料指標或開頭和/或之選取範圍的結束點將只應該繪製在指定當使用者互動所設定的間隔。A nonzero value signifies that the cursor or beginning and/or end points of a selected range will only be drawn at the specified interval when set by user interaction. 度量單位由屬性。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 這個屬性也可以用於搭配屬性，可讓您指定的位移，從指定的時間間隔。This property can also be used in conjunction with the property, which allows you to specify an offset from the specified interval. 比方說，若要允許的資料指標才會顯示每個星期六，間隔為 1 週應指定，以及為 6 天的間隔位移。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在.NET Framework 中，會星期日視為一週的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果資料指標使用者介面來設定啟用屬性，而且滑鼠按一下圖表區域內部，游標的位置將會設定為最接近可允許的位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性沒有任何作用，如果您設定資料指標的位置，或以程式設計方式選取範圍的範圍。The property has no effect if you set the position of a cursor or range selection programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定間隔位移，當使用者設定資料指標和範圍選取時，間隔位移會影響可以繪製資料指標和範圍選取的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset, which affects where the cursor and range selection can be drawn when they are set by a user.
The offset from the interval.

value.span: 預設值為零 (表示沒有限制)，而且允許使用負值。

span.span: The default value is zero, which signifies no limitations, and negative values are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定間隔位移的資料指標和開始及/或選取範圍的結束點。The property determines the interval offset of a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection. 搭配屬性，這個屬性會決定在資料指標和範圍可以顯示在圖表區域中。In conjunction with the property, this property determines where a cursor and range can be displayed within a chart area. 值為零，也就是預設值，表示沒有位移。A value of zero, which is the default, signifies that there is no offset. 度量單位由屬性。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 位移會影響的資料指標和的開頭和/或選取範圍的結束點可以繪製的位置。The offset affects the locations at which a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection can be drawn. 比方說，若要允許的資料指標才會顯示每個星期六，間隔為 1 週應指定，以及為 6 天的間隔位移。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在.NET Framework 中，會星期日視為一週的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果資料指標使用者介面來設定啟用屬性，而且滑鼠按一下圖表區域內部，游標的位置將會設定為最接近可允許的位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 間隔相關屬性都不會影響當選取範圍或資料指標位置會以程式設計方式設定。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的資料指標和選取範圍的間隔位移類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of a cursor and selected range for an axis.

value.span: 列舉值，決定間隔位移的度量單位。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the unit of measurement for the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定使用指定的間隔位移類型屬性。The property determines the type of interval offset, which is specified using the property. 如果屬性設定為、 ，會使用屬性設定。If the property is set to , the property setting will be used. > [!NOTE] > 間隔相關屬性都不會影響當選取範圍或資料指標位置會以程式設計方式設定。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的資料指標和選取範圍的間隔類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

value.span: 座標軸的資料指標和所選範圍的間隔類型。

span.span: The interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性決定的間隔，使用指定的類型屬性。The property determines the type of interval, which is specified using the property. 如果間隔類型為，間隔的度量單位會被視為`double`，這相當於一天時指定的值。If the interval type is , the unit of measurement for the interval is treated as a `double`, which is equivalent to one day when values are specified. > [!NOTE] > 間隔相關屬性都不會影響當選取範圍，或以程式設計方式設定資料指標位置。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position is set programmatically. 如果軸間隔類型代表時間 — 比方說，小時、 分鐘等等，然後才能正確地啟用縮放函式，也必須設定為時間值。If the axis interval type represents a time—for example, hours, minutes, and so forth—then in order to correctly enable the zooming function, the must also be set to a time value. 例如，如果 ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType 會表示小時，則 ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType 無法設為分鐘。For example, if the ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is expressed in hours, then the ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsUserEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標可啟用或停用資料指標使用者介面。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that enables or disables the cursor user interface.

value.span: 如果啟用資料指標使用者介面則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cursor user interface is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that enables or disables the range selection user interface.

value.span: 如果啟用範圍選取使用者介面則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the range selection user interface is enabled; otherwise, .

The line color of the cursor.
The default value is .

The style of the cursor line.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料指標的線條寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of a cursor

value.span: 線條寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The line width, in pixels.
The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定線條寬度，單位為像素資料指標。Use this property to specify the line width, in pixels, of a cursor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Position { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料指標的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
The position of a cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來取得游標的位置，以及以程式設計方式設定資料指標位置。This property can be used to get the position of a cursor, as well as to programmatically set the cursor position. 位置以表示軸的值屬於資料指標，是由決定屬性。The position is measured as a value of the axis that the cursor belongs to, which is determined by the property. 例如，如果資料指標屬於主要 X 軸，然後將此屬性設定為 2000 年 1 月 1 日的值會導致在 2000 年 1 月 1 日位置沿著軸繪製 x 軸資料指標。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X axis, then setting this property to a value of January 1, 2000 will result in the X-axis cursor being drawn at the January 1, 2000 position along the axis. 如果此軸的值不存在，將不會顯示資料指標。If this axis value does not exist, the cursor will not be displayed. 請注意，如果您設定此屬性，則和屬性將沒有效果; 也就是資料指標將會顯示在此指定的位置。Note that if you set this property, the and properties will have no effect; that is, the cursor will be displayed at this specified location. 設定這個屬性將不會引發或事件。Setting this property will not raise the or events. 或者，和方法可以用來設定資料指標。Alternatively, the and methods can be used to set the cursor. 若要以程式設計方式移除資料指標，請使用這個屬性來設定游標的位置。To programmatically remove a cursor, use this property to set the position of the cursor to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color SelectionColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定反白顯示一段資料範圍的半透明色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets a semi-transparent color that highlights a range of data.
The color of the highlighted range.

value.span: 預設值為 ，而且 Alpha 值為 120。

span.span: The default value is , with an alpha value of 120.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定範圍選取區的色彩，您可以將任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。This property determines the color of the range selection, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果 alpha 值判斷透明度，未提供，則會使用預設 alpha 值是 120。If an alpha value, which determines the level of transparency, is not provided, a default alpha value of 120 is used. 選取的色彩可以設定 X 和 Y 軸資料指標，這使用實作和屬性分別物件。The selected color can be set for both the X and Y axis cursors, which is implemented using the and properties of the object, respectively. 如果沿著 x 軸，只選取某個範圍如果沿著 y 軸，只選取某個範圍的值會使用 x 軸資料指標; y 軸資料指標使用的值。If a range is only selected along the X-axis, the value for the X-axis cursor is used; if a range is only selected along the Y-axis, the value for the Y-axis cursor is used. 如果兩個座標軸，沿著選取範圍y 軸資料指標也可用於所選取之色彩的值。If a range is selected along both axes, the value for the Y-axis cursor is also used for the selected color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SelectionEnd { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定範圍選取的結束位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the end position of a range selection.
The end position of a range selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以選取範圍，以在圖表區域中的按一下滑鼠左鍵並拖曳滑鼠。A user can select a range within a chart area by clicking on the left mouse button and then dragging the mouse. 請注意，屬性也必須設定為`true`。Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外，選取範圍可以設定以程式設計方式使用和屬性，或或方法。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 選取範圍的結束位置計算為軸資料指標所屬的值。The end position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如，如果資料指標屬於主要 x 軸，而且您設定屬性設為 2000 年 12 月 31 日的值選取區域的一端會在 2000 年 12 月 31 日主要沿著 X 軸。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of December 31, 2000, the end of the selected area will occur at December 31, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以程式設計方式移除選取範圍，設定開始和結束點之範圍的使用和屬性或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SelectionStart { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料指標所選取之範圍的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the start position of a cursor's selected range.

value.span: 游標的所選範圍的起始位置。

span.span: The start position of a cursor’s selected range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以選取範圍上滑鼠左鍵按一下，然後拖曳滑鼠移動游標位置。A user can select a range by clicking on the left mouse button and then moving the cursor position by dragging the mouse. 請注意，屬性也必須設定為`true`。Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外，選取範圍可以設定以程式設計方式使用和屬性，或或方法。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 選取範圍的開始位置計算為軸資料指標所屬的值。The start position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如，如果資料指標屬於主要 x 軸，而且您設定屬性設為 2000 年 1 月 1 日的值在選取的區域的開頭會在 2000 年 1 月 1 日主要沿著 X 軸。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of January 1, 2000, the beginning of the selected area will occur at January 1, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以程式設計方式移除選取範圍，設定開始和結束點之範圍的使用和屬性或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.

param.name: roundToBoundary

span.span: If , the cursor will be drawn along the nearest chart area boundary, if the specified position does not fall within a object.

summary.span: 在指定位置顯示資料指標。

span.span: Displays a cursor at the specified position.

summary.span: 以像素為單位。

span.span: Measured in pixels.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCursorPosition(float64 newPosition) cil managed

param.name: newPosition

span.span: The new position of the cursor.

param.span: 以沿著相關軸上的值表示。

span.span: Measured as a value along the relevant axis.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSelectionPixelPosition (System.Drawing.PointF startPoint, System.Drawing.PointF endPoint, bool roundToBoundary);

Public Sub SetSelectionPixelPosition (startPoint As PointF, endPoint As PointF, roundToBoundary As Boolean)
public: void SetSelectionPixelPosition(System::Drawing::PointF startPoint, System::Drawing::PointF endPoint, bool roundToBoundary);

param.name: startPoint
param.span: 結構，指定範圍選取的起始位置。

span.span: A structure that specifies where the range selection begins.

param.name: endPoint
param.span: 結構，指定範圍選取的結束位置。

span.span: A structure that specifies where the range selection ends.

param.name: roundToBoundary
param.span: 如果是 ，表示如果指定的位置不在 物件內，起始點和結束點將靠近最近的圖表區域界線。

span.span: If , the start and end points will be rounded to the nearest chart area boundary if the specified positions do not fall within a object.

summary.span: 設定範圍選取的起始和結束位置。

span.span: Sets the start and end positions of a range selection.
